issue.body:
https://monograph.notesnook.com/65357253f1f1f100624e4e50/

This note specifically. Could it be related to publishing? Could it be related to the fact that I copy pasted the images into the document (making all the filenames just "image"?

I tried rechecking. It seems to work but then a few seconds later, it goes back to its previous state.

Pro: true

issue.title: Imported PDF files are empty on iOS
issue.body:
### What happened?

I'm having an issue on my iPhone where PDF files are empty. When I open them they show "Page 1/0" (page 1 of 0) and it has no content. It doesn't matter if share the PDF from another app, or from that other app save it to files, then from the NotesNook app import from the file.

### Steps to reproduce the problem

Import a PDF file, either from files, or share from another app

### Version

2.6.7

### Platform/OS

iOS

### Relevant log output

_No response_

issue.title: IOS Reauthorizing Sesssion Link Broken
issue.body:
This is a repost. The original ticket was closed because it wasn’t clear this happened in the iOS app. 

I was prompted to reauthorize my session link. Received the code. The keypad was blocking the button to submit the code. No way apart from signing out and signing back in to access.


_______________
**Device information:**
App version: 2.6.7
Platform: ios
Model: --
Pro: true
Logged in: yes

comment.body: I have had this issue as well for quite a while as well on IOS. It is annoying enough that if it isn't fixed soon I won't be renewing my subscription and will have to look elsewhere. This bug is extremely annoying!

issue.title: Can't Set Default Code Language for Code Blocks
issue.body:
When taking notes about code, it's primarily about Python.  Every time I create a code block, I have to select Python.  These are extra steps I take almost every time I create a code block.  It would be much better to be able to set the default code language to Python so I don't have to change it every time I create a code block.

**Device information:**
App version: 2.6.7-3895569-web
OS: Windows 10 64-bit
Browser: Microsoft Edge 118.0.2088.46
Pro: true

issue.title: Widget resize vertically
issue.body:
Hello dev,

    Thank you for making the widget resizable, it's resizable horizontally, but vertically it's still taking up space and does not align with other widgets position on screen.

I'm a free user, but thank you for considering my feedback and making the widget resizable 

But i have a problem with the browser extention on windows, even with signing in on both browser extention and the windows app, with sync on, the clipper extention copy and edits does not reflect on the main app, either on Android or the windows app.

On the brighter side is my go to app for taking quick notes and exchange of phone numbers, also the pin notification is very helpful, on the go i can do grocery shopping, mark the address I'm searching for pin it 

It's a great productive app over all 

Have a good day.
_______________
**Device information:**
App version: 2.6.7
Platform: android
Model: LAVA-LAVA LXX503-33
Pro: false
Logged in: no

issue.title: keyboard shortcuts / mousewheel for notebooks
issue.body:
Hello!

In my handling with Notesnook I find it a bit "clumsy" to switch between notebooks. If I am in a notebook, I have to use my mouse, hit the (quite small) "back arrow", then choose another notebook, click on it...

I think it could be much faster to be able to use keyboard shortcuts, for example the two "right" and "left" arrow keys to switch between "notes" and "notebooks" section and the two "up" and "down" arrow keys to go through the list of notebooks or whatever feels practical after some testing.

In addition you could allow to assign specific hotkeys directly to specific notebooks so that with that key combination I would instantly open that respective notebook.

============

AND/OR I could hover over the notebook name (that are is much bigger than the "back" arrow) and with the mousewheel "scroll" (switch) through the existing notebooks, if that can be visually redrawn fast enough. So I could use the mousewheel, check a considerable number of notes (the "previews") at a glance in one notebook and almost instantly switch the next or previous notebook with the mousewheel. 

Even if that would be possible I still think a key combination to switch between "notes" view and "notebooks" view would be very helpful.

Best regards and keep up the good work!

**Device information:**
App version: 2.6.7-0aac29c-desktop
OS: Windows 10 64-bit
Browser: Electron 25.8.1
Pro: true

issue.title: Regular App Freeze
issue.body:
It happens often in different ways, most often it happens when I long press on a note and want to select all or export or etc and after selecting some if those options I can't continue further as the app froze completly and I have to restart it.

Pro: false
Logged in: yes

issue.title: crop images
issue.body:
I think it would be very helpful, if you could add a "simple" crop function for the image menu so that for example when taking a "screenshot" of a web page I can quickly "cut off" the advertising on the bottom by just dragging a handle upwards from the bottom. (The same mechanism of course from the sides)

PicPick Screenshot software has this implemented in their image editor, you can download it for free and check the behaviour. I think this is very practical and straightforward. 

They have handles on each for corners as well as in the middle of all four sides. 

Best regards and good luck!



**Device information:**
App version: 2.6.7-0aac29c-desktop
OS: Windows 10 64-bit
Browser: Electron 25.8.1
Pro: true

issue.title: No capital letters for tags - German
issue.body:
Dear Notesnook team! I come from Germany and it would be helpful, if you could allow also capital letters for tags for Germany. The German brain can recognize nouns much faster, if they start with a capital letter, we are "hard wired that way"  ;-)

Thanks a lot for caring!

**Device information:**
App version: 2.6.7-0aac29c-desktop
OS: Windows 10 64-bit
Browser: Electron 25.8.1
Pro: true

issue.title: Thumbnails "missing"
issue.body:
It would be very helpful to have not only a text preview of the note (the note title), but as an alternative a thumbnail that either is like a mini-screenshot of the "whole" note or a picture that I can select and upload. 

This would speed up recognizing a specific note tremendously. Up till now I use Telegram messenger channels as a kind of notebooks, but this is not end-to-end encrypted and thus I want to switch to notesnook. 

I hope this is on the roadmap or already in development.

Otherwise I have a very good first impression with Notesnook! Finally it seems there is a practical and still safe note taking app growing mature :-)

Best regards,

Ingo

**Device information:**
App version: 2.6.7-0aac29c-desktop
OS: Windows 10 64-bit
Browser: Electron 25.8.1
Pro: true

comment.body:
Thank you very much!

Please keep me up-to-date. If there is any (beta-) testing in this respect I could participate in, please let me know!

Concerning "emulating" chats or channels like in instant messengers (people are simply used to that) it could also make sense that if a user wants to attach several pictures to a note that there is a kind of "gallery grid" to have several thumbnails arranged in a reasonable size and order. Maybe even both in the preview (at least for example for mini-thumbnails in a 2 by 2 grid either automatic or at least on PC selectable later) AND in the note itself for maximum "recognition" speed, clear layout of a note and as a fast overview of the relevant content.

Related to photos an additional thought: I myself take many "visual notes" and add some textual context or description to them. Could you somehow make a shortcut button that allows me to take photo - add a short note and then save it? Currently I have to go through many steps: press (the very tiny) "+" -> press "image" -> press "take a photo using camera" -> wait for the camera -> press "checkmark" -> then add text.

Maybe you can add a direct option to the big green "+" button on the lower right corner "start photo note" and directly activate camera and when checkmark is pressed open text input?

And just while writing I realize that almost the same for speech notes (audio notes) would be great (one day!)

Best regards!

Can't clip youtube page

### Steps to reproduce the problem

try to clip Youtube page using web clipper. It will return a note with title and link and an empty web view window.

2.6.7

Chrome/Chromium

_No response_
